{"url":"http://www.lovelysunday.co","name":"LovelySunday","description":"

Two best friends setting out to explore the west coast in our favorite outfits! We love fashion, photography, lettering, anything with glitter on it, and have a slight obsession with flamingoes! Follow us on our journey and we hope to inspire you along the way! 

With lots of love, 

Aileen & Rory

mainText: Nov 29 Balmain Blazer Everyone needs a tailored black blazer in their closet- it's timeless. This Balmain Double-breasted piqu√© blazer with gold military style buttons is beyond gorgeous with an unsurprisingly high price tag. We all got a chance to get this blazer with the recent Balmain x H&M collection for a huge price reduction. The collaboration was in such high demand that everything sold out in a matter of minutes! I was so bummed I didn't get my hands on one, but I felt so much better when I found this blazer from Missguided that looks so similar to the Balmain X H&M version. There are so many ways to style this piece, its all about how to make it personal to your style. How to Style Your Black Blazer I love it worn as a dress, a clutch with a pop of color, and a skinny black sandal. It works for a casual day worn unbuttoned over distressed denim, a loose white t-shirt, black patent leather loafers, a black bucket bag, and edgy gold accessories. You can't go wrong with white pants, black strappy heels, a black top with a lace trim, a black wool fedora, and an embellished clutch for added texture. Balmain Blazer $2430 Balmain X H&M $499 MissGuided $68 On Alexa Chung: Aileen Rathee Subscribe to my latest looks! Be the first the see the latest looks or blogs from the Lookbook! SIGN UP Recently from the Lookbook Jan 7, 2019 Aileen YSL Studio Paris, France Find me on @Instagram @_lovelysunday

We all got a chance to get this blazer with the recent Balmain x H&M collection for a huge price reduction. The collaboration was in such high demand that everything sold out in a matter of minutes! I was so bummed I didn't get my hands on one, but I felt so much better when I found this blazer from Missguided that looks so similar to the Balmain X H&M version. There are so many ways to style this piece, its all about how to make it personal to your style.

I love it worn as a dress, a clutch with a pop of color, and a skinny black sandal.

You can't go wrong with white pants, black strappy heels, a black top with a lace trim, a black wool fedora, and an embellished clutch for added texture.
